content.rendered:
24v 40a Relay 4 Pin

DETAILS

By default all wiring kits bundled in with our driving lights come with a 12v relay. Our replacement 24v relay is a direct fit to our entire driving light harness range.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 24 Volt
  • 40 Amp
  • 4 Pin

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 24v 4 Pin Relay

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 24V 4 PIN RELAY

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
